title: Luxury House for Sale in Gampaha.
details: Furnished Three Storied Luxury House for Sale at Ihala Imbulgoda, Gampaha. Just 500 m to Kandy Road. Recently built (2012) house on 13.5 Perches Land, approx 2,750 Sq. Ft floor area. Consist 4 Bedrooms with A/C master bedroom, 4 Bathrooms, Living, Dining, TV Lounge, Balcony with nice Paddy field view, Store room, Remote roller gate, Solar hot water.
